Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Madison
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Jackson, Hamlin, Madison and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Jackson, Hamlin, Madison and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Madison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
